text: Charles Kopp (born 1902, date of death unknown) was a Swiss swimmer. He competed in the men's 100 metre freestyle event and the water polo at the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1902 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Swiss male swimmers Category:Swiss male water polo players Category:Olympic swimmers of Switzerland Category:Olympic water polo players of Switzerland Category:Swimmers at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:Water polo players at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Charles Kopp
